title: St. George's Parade & Service
description: Tewkesbury Scouts invites you to our St. George's Parade and Service at Tewkesbury Abbey.

title: Beavers & Cubs Activity Day
description: Calling all Beavers and Cubs! Join us on the River Avon for a day of water and bushcraft activities.

title: Scouts & Explorers Activity Day
description: Calling all Scouts and Explorers! Join us on the River Avon for a day of water and bushcraft activities.
